name: test_e2e_with_logs[238_CMD_SUB_004]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_SUB_004` |
| **Name** | System info via backtick substitution |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | command_substitution |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details
